MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride, affecting properties in Westwood Hill and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.25am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault located at Westerwood Brae substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.23am on the 16th of March 2021.
